Articles.Content: So, in the case of a parts mod, is it okay to only use some of the parts (like delete the others) for our own install?
It is like you have a whole set of tools, but you only need a screw driver presently, and so you only take that from the tool box.

Pruning part packs in personal installs is perfectly legitimate - for instance, in my old save I liked AIES's probe cores, but didn't care for the rocket parts, so I kept the former and excised the latter.
indeed, why would it not be... Of course don't go running to the mod creator for support if you delete something the mod needs to work...
